Emma isn't a movie from the provided list, but let me recommend two movies based on your preferences for love stories, written by Jane Austen, and English language.

1. "Pride & Prejudice" (2005) - Starring Keira Knightley and Matthew Macfadyen, this romantic period drama is a captivating adaptation of Jane Austen's novel of the same name. It tells the story of Elizabeth Bennet and Mr. Darcy, two individuals who initially dislike each other but eventually fall in love.

2. "Sense and Sensibility" (1995) - This film is another Austen adaptation, featuring Emma Thompson, Alan Rickman, Kate Winslet, and Hugh Grant. It explores the lives of the Dashwood sisters, Elinor and Marianne, as they navigate love, loss, and social expectations in 19th-century England.
